page.title: 06Elton Primary School
page.content:
Diary of a school day.
We start school at 9 o'clock with assembly. One of the Junior children took assembly today; he read about the snake. Afterwards Rev. Servante took us for R.E., we then did S.M.P. which is Maths. I really like S.M.P. At 11 0'clock, after playtime, we do "Singing Together" from the Radio. We sing and use percussion instruments. At 12 o'clock we clear the classroom and put the tables out ready for dinner. The dinners come from Bakewell and are served by the dinner ladies. School starts again at 1.10 p.m. Today we are going to the swimming baths in Matlock. On other afternoons we do P.E. in school using the large apparatus or we go to the playing field. We might do art and craft and then have a story until 3.30 hometime.
